Opening is ignored on touch devices.

searchParam.title: Name of the field that search should operate on. Search value will insert in filter by this parameter.

minSearchLength.title: The minimum number of characters a user must type before a search is performed.

searchDelay.title: The delay between when a symvol was typed and when a search is performed.
